Helpers¶

bulkmodel.helpers.get_chunks(l, n, max_chunks=None)¶

Returns a chunked version of list l with a maximum of n items in each chunk

Parameters:
  • l (iterable[T]) – list of items of type T
  • n (int) – max size of each chunk
  • max_chunks (int) – maximum number of chunks that can be returned. Pass none (the default) for unbounded
Returns:

list of chunks
Return type:

list[T]
